attributes.action: Change age limit to joining any form of social media to 16 plus
attributes.background: Help safeguard our children by putting the age limit up to at least 16+ for joining any form of socal media. Make the websites accountable for underage users

rejection.details:
At the moment, age policies are the responsibility of social media sites.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal to offer social media accounts to children under 16, then you could start a petition asking for that.
